lead_paragraph: Patty Schnyder defeated Anabel Medina Garrigues, 6-3, 6-2, in the first round of the Rogers Cup in Toronto.The 10th-seeded Schnyder was making her fifth appearance in the event, but her first since 2002, when she lost in the second round to Daniela Hantuchova.
